alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Fajardo; Luquillo; Rio Grande (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 12:04AM ADT until September 19 at 7:30AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Canovanas County in Puerto Rico... Fajardo County in Puerto Rico... Luquillo County in Puerto Rico... Rio Grande County in Puerto Rico... * Until 630 AM AST Monday. * At 1104 PM AST, gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 12 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is up to 2.5 inches per hour. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Doppler Radar and Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. The Canovanas River is likely to return to flood stage again tonight. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...2.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
